QuestData.Title: The Floodsurge Core
QuestData.Description: This is all that's left of the huge elemental that attacked you: a frothing orb of water that continues to fight your grip.$B$BForba might appreciate seeing proof that you helped stop another threat to the camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Floodsurge Core to Forba Slabchisel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Eh? What's that you've got there?
QuestData.RewardText: The thing's still got some fight in it! Amazing!$B$BYou're a tough one, $n. It's much appreciated. I'd say a reward is in order before you head out.$B$BKeep doin' your best for Ironforge, you hear? And if you ever see my sister, say hello for me.
